p: The genome sequences of the clinical isolates characterized in the present study, YT226R/SDYT/CVA4/China/2015, LY124R/SDLY/CVA4/China/2014, H337/SDHZ/CVA4/China/2015, LC16114/SDLC/CVA4/China/2016, WF057R/CVA6/China/2014, TA271/CVA16/China/2015 and SD004R/EVA71/China/2015 have been deposited in GenBank under accession numbers MH086040, MH086031, MH086030, MH086049, KX752785, MG674827 and KY315729.
